titleStmt.title: The Protestants letter concerning the re-union of the two religions to the Assembly of the clergy of France, held at Paris, May, 1685 humbly offered to the consideration of all Protestants in England, as an expedient for reconciling the great differences in religion now among them.
titleStmt.author: Kidder, Richard, 1633-1703.

titleStmt.title: The Protestants letter concerning the re-union of the two religions to the Assembly of the clergy of France, held at Paris, May, 1685 humbly offered to the consideration of all Protestants in England, as an expedient for reconciling the great differences in religion now among them.
titleStmt.author: Kidder, Richard, 1633-1703.
Catholic Church. Assemblée générale du clergé de France.

notesStmt.note: The epistle dedicatory signed: Richard Kidder.
Formerly identified as Wing K409 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
